transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Yes mam good evening mam, athan call pannirukoma?
Customer: Customer care call pannirukingala?
Executive: Aah theriyala vera oru staff kooda irukken theriyama avanga new staff than so avanga theriyama kai pattirukken nu ninaikiren.
Customer: Okay intha concern by mistake aayirukalaam.
Executive: Okay by mistake aayirukken.
Executive: Okay no problem mobile appla account manager number eppadi edukkanumnu theriyumgala?
Customer: Sorry mam
Executive: Mobile appla account manager number eppadi edukkanumnu ungalukku theriyumgala?
Customer: Mobile appla neenga enngaloda number aa?
Executive: Yes
Customer: Aah atha naanga systemthula thaan paakaraanga paakuvanga phone la number paakala systemthula thaan irukkaanga mam mamoda name sindhu thaan athane?
Executive: Yes mam okay okay.
Executive: Actually mobile appla indiamart mobile appla left side three line irukkum.
Customer: Okay one second paakattum.
Executive: Okay athu click panni keela scroll panni paathinganna ungalukku vanthu paathinganna customer support nu irukkum athula mobile appla account manager number eduthukkalaam athu easy way directaa whatsapplaye text pannalaam three line left sidela unga name irukkum yes.
Customer: Okay left linela keela scroll pannunga.
Executive: Okay
Executive: Customer support irukkum.
Customer: Customer support atha customer support athula account manager.
Executive: Athula account manager okay athu athu athu call varuma call varuvaangala?
Executive: Athula call pannakoodathu athula call or request and video meet call antha maari kodukkaama whatsapp text panni directaa text pannunga.
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Text pannittu call pannunga athula athukappuram antha number eduthu directaa call pannunga.
Customer: Okay mam illanna intha maari concern rise aagum second one customer care reach panni athu engalukku connect aagum.
Executive: Appadiya oh sorry sorry mam okay okay.
Executive: Okay okay no problem itha next time avangalukku guide pannirunga.
Customer: Okay ippo ungalukku account manager support venumnaalum whatsapplaye whatsapp text pannikkalaam.
Customer: Just paakalaama account manager open panni paakalaama problem illa.
Executive: Account manager open panni whatsapp text panni message pannunga.
Customer: Okay okay okay text pannina varuthaannu paakalaam whatsapp irukkaanga.
Executive: Hmm irukku.
Customer: Okay okay paakalaam okay athaan mam ippo vanthuruchilla.
Customer: Aah message vanthurukku.
Executive: Okay mam okay ippadi thaan edukkanum avangalukkum guide pannidunga neenga call mail video meetla poi click pannurathukku pathila directaa whatsapp eduthaa ungalukkum problem kidayathu account managerkum easyyaa connect panna mudiyum.
Customer: Okay morning 10 to 6:30 varaa avanga available iruppaanga so whatsappla kandippaa reply pannuvaanga.
Customer: Okay mam okay okay in case suppose change aanaa kooda vera yaaraathu account manager varaanga appidinaalume avanga vanthu ungalukku intha maari neenga avanga contact number eduthukkalaam.
Customer: Okay okay okay ithukappuram avangathaan handle panna poraangala?
Executive: Illa naanga rendum sernthu thaan seiraanga.
Customer: Sernthu thaan seiringala?
Executive: Aama innaikku kiran nu oruthar irunthaaru kiran saratha avaru guide panniralaam yes ungalukku comfortableaa irukkanumnu solrathukkaaga.
Customer: Okay okay naan innaikku naan leave appo naan thaan mam mamnu call pannathaa ninaikiren.
Executive: Kiran saratha avarukku guide pannalaam.
Customer: Okay mam thank you itha guide pannidunga mam eppadi pannannumnu sollittu ennaa ovvoru timeum customer reach panni athu engala reach pannurathukku late aagumla.
Executive: Aah okay okay athunaala neenga intha maari vararappo puthusa vera yaaraathu staff varaanganaalume avangala guide pannidunga.
Customer: Okay mam okay okay thank you so much okayngala vera ethavathu doubtsnaalum enakku ithe numberukku neenga text pannunga intha number neenga save pannirukkeengala?
Customer: Aah intha number athula intha number illa sujitha whatsapp number whatsapp number whatsapp number thaan mam number 456 laa varunga.
Executive: Ahaa 711
Executive: 711
Executive: One second yes okay save pannirukkaanga mam ethunaalum athe numberukku call pannunga.
Customer: Okay mam okay okay okay thank you mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a call by mistake.

- Wants to know how to get account manager number.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to get number from app.

- Executive explained how to connect via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will guide staff on how to connect.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, whatsapp, support, guide
